dict.string: Media library access is required to select and manage audio files related to patient guidance, ensuring a seamless experience for in-app playback and healthcare education.
Camera access is required to allow users to capture images of medical reports for upload and record essential patient data.
Continuous location access is required for live tracking of the doctor to ensure accurate and consistent navigation services for the patient.
Location access in the background is essential for continuous live tracking of the doctor to improve patient visibility and ensure timely updates.
Location access while using the app is necessary to share the doctor's real-time location with patients for live tracking purposes.
Microphone access is required for voice-to-text input in fields and for recording patient complaints to enhance user experience.
Motion data access is required to monitor activity levels or steps, enabling enhanced features for tracking patient mobility and ensuring a better healthcare experience.
Access to the photo library is needed to save images or media files related to medical reports and patient records directly to the device.
Photo library access is required to select medical report images from the gallery for uploading to the patient's record.
Your app requires access to speech recognition to convert your spoken words into text in the input field.
